title: What are the broadband connections available in Mogappair, Chennai? - Quora

response.answer_text: ACT Broadband is value for money in Chennai. You can call them and check whether they have services available in Mogappair. Here is the link:ACT Broadband | 25 MBPS | IPTV | Digital TV | Analog TV | Internet Connection | Broadband High Speed

ACT gives fibernet, with good speed, but heard from acquaintance that customer care is not that good. BSNL and Airtel give same offering some difference are BNSL has intermittent connectivity lossBSNL dont give much importance to customers [as other govt companies].
